text: Close to the building projects would be the VINEYARDS (1 4.25; S. of Sol. 8.11) The word is a Persian loan-word, pairi-deaza, from which our word paradise is derived. Qoheleth has a second paradise at his disposal but he is no happier than Adam was! The word is used in the singular in Neh. 2.8 and S. of Sol. 4.13.
